description.brief: Playstation 3 SIXAXIS or DUAL SHOCK 3 joystick driver.

package.description: Local fork of ps3joy driver. Adds partial support for Bluetooth v1. Adds controller shutdown on PS3 button, computer shutdown upon press of all four top buttons, LED control from ROS [this ps3joy.py is a ROS node] and other details.
package.author: ps3joy: Blaise Gassend and pascal@pabr.org (modified by ktossell@umd.edu)
